def_cn: (感觉、理解)加强;(使)加深;(技巧)提高;(使)改善
def_en: If your senses, understanding, or skills sharpen or are sharpened, you become better at noticing things, thinking, or doing something.
If you sharpen an object, you make its edge very thin or you make its end pointed.

def_cn: (分歧、差异等)加剧;(使)加深;(使)加重
def_en: If disagreements or differences between people sharpen, or if they are sharpened, they become bigger or more important.
